SEARCH
Module brickGame
Package brickGame.Model.GameElements

Class BonusBlock

java.lang.Object
brickGame.Model.GameElements.BonusBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BonusBlock extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a bonus block in the game. Bonus blocks contain special items and effects. This class handle the bonus falling objects.
See Also:
